- I wonder how much more expensive it is to produce electricity from clean sources compared to fossil fuels.Furthermore, I wonder how much the switch to clean electricity from fossil fuels would be.
- This relates to me and my community as the increased pollution from fossil fuels are slowly ruining the quality of air which will eventually ruin the quality of life for myself and my peers. It also puts into perspective how much electricity is being used globally and how fast it grew from two decades prior to the present day. In addition, in surrounding towns the production of energy is a major thing with many power plants that produce energy with these fossil fuels, progressing the irreversible damage of global warming.
- Although Ancient, Fossil Fuels Remain Relevant
